passage_text: In Louisville, salaries for physical therapy assistant professionals have increased. Louisville physical therapy assistant professionals made $37,590 per year, on average, in 2010. Physical therapy assistant professionals in Louisville made a yearly average salary of $32,445, four years earlier in 2006. The growth in the salary of physical therapy assistant professionals in Louisville is faster than the salary trend for all careers in the city.
The average salary you can expect to earn as a physical therapy assistant in Louisville is $51,290 per year. This is higher than the state-wide average salary for physical therapy assistants.

The average wage for a Physical Therapist Assistant is $24.54 per hour. The highest paying skills associated with this job are Home Health/Home Care and Long Term Care. Most people with this job move on to other positions after 20 years in this career.
$54,000. Average Physical Therapist Assistant salaries for job postings in Louisville, KY are 21% lower than average Physical Therapist Assistant salaries for job postings nationwide.
Average Physical Therapy Assistant salaries for job postings in Louisville, KY are 21% lower than average Physical Therapy Assistant salaries for job postings nationwide.
The average pay for a Certified Occupational Therapy Assistant (COTA) in Louisville, Kentucky is $24.21 per hour.
